description: A feral human in filthy clothing with desperation evident in their eyes as they search for food or anything of value. This one is scratching the side of their head with the barrel of a shoddy pistol.

special_attacks.description: The scav haphazardly fires their pistol!

description: A feral human in filthy clothing with desperation evident in their eyes as they search for food or anything of value. This one is holding a rusty submachine gun at one hip while the other hand picks their nose.

special_attacks.description: The scav holds the submachine gun up with one hand and fires a burst!

description: A feral human in filthy clothing with desperation evident in their eyes as they search for food or anything of value. This one has a ridiculously wide barreled shotgun that it brandishes at any movement.

special_attacks.description: The scav just rips a shot out there!

description: A feral human in filthy clothing with desperation evident in their eyes as they search for food or anything of value. This one has a rifle gripped close to it's chest, ready to aim and start blasting.

special_attacks.description: The scav stops, aims and fires a single shot!

description: A feral human in filthy clothing with desperation evident in their eyes as they search for food or anything of value.

special_attacks.description: The scav stops, aims and fires a single shot!

description: A tentacle that is so large it simply must be from a kraken, called to the surface by some wicked nautical sorceror. It snatches wildly at the closest thing.

name: Call of the Deep
description: There's something ancient that lives deep below the earth. Call and it will answer.

name: Summons kraken tentacles
description: Spawn spirals

A person dressed like a pirate, complete with eyepatch and pegleg. They're honking a clown nose, piss drunk, cackling and cutting down zombies with a cutlass. There a mass of tentancles reaching out from under their tricorne hat, and they hold a stunningly beautiful flintlock pistol.

special_attacks.monster_message: A huge tentacle rips through the ground!

special_attacks.description: The pirate yanks a cannon from their baldric and blasts!

name: Flying Thunder God
description: The raijin turns you into lightning and you follow the path of the bullet.

name: Flying Raijin Teleport
description: Teleport for flying thunder god
A person in highly technical survivor armor over a traditional samurai gi. Lightning seems to fill their eyes, gripping a katana as they cut their way through the hordes.

special_attacks.description: A bolt of pure lightning fires from out of the samurai's sleeve!

description: A simple looking person in a robe and sandals. They're holding a nailgun in a wood and metal frame, as if that's going to do anything. They're rabid with righteous fervor, nailing anything left in this world to the cross.

special_attacks.description: The priest fires a flaming nail of holy light!

name: Cook Mod Moves
description: The cook sits down and starts eating stew

name: Make Stew
description: Calls stew to cooks side

name: Stew gets eaten
description: Everyone gets some stew

name: Cook Eats Stew
description: The cook sits down and starts eating stew
A big pot of stew. Anybody who gets close enough gets a whiff of that delicious aroma, and knows that one bite will cure your deepest ailments.

special_attacks.monster_message: Everyone shares in a big 'ol bite of stew!

description: A person in a chef's frock that's been torn nearly to shreds, stains of all unearthly kinds covering them. Underneath the frock is a suit of bullet-resistant survivor's armor that's seen it's fair share of battle. In one hand is a bloody butcher's knife, and you notice the healthy glow of someone who's been eating proper food. Their other arm is wrapped around a scoped revolver sitting in a large frame, which they fire and reload with deadly efficiency.

special_attacks.monster_message: The cook sits down, pulls out a pot, and brews up a nice pot of stew!

special_attacks.description: The cook raises their firearm and fires!

name: Call Squire
description: Calls squires to your side

name: Squire heals knight
description: The squire heals the knight
A young, silly looking squire to a psychotic knight. A tale as old as time, really.

special_attacks.monster_message: The squire dashes to their master's side and bandages some wounds!

description: A horn made of a huge, unrecognizable bone that was pulled from a knight's side. Blowing it calls an aide to your side. You could probably get a couple squires out of it before they realize you're not a knight.

A person in a full body suit of knight's armor wielding an extremely long, curved sword. Their other hand is holding up a large shield with a few arrows in their palm. You don't see a bow, but a gleeful smile shoots daggers at you anyway.

special_attacks.monster_message: The knight blows the horn at their side and a squire comes running!

special_attacks.description: The knight places an arrow in their sword hand, nocks and fires it off their blade!

description: A huge grey wolf with an even larger rail rifle haphazardly sewn into it's back. Big enough to ride, if you'd dare.

special_attacks.description: The wolf goes to it's haunches and fires the rail rifle!

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you! It lets you pat its head and seems friendly.

name: Call Wolf
description: You howl, calling a wolf to your side.

name: Call Wolf
description: You howl, calling a wolf to your side.

A person in a full body suit designed to make them look like a werewolf with a lab coat overtop. They're pretending to be a wolf, sniffing at the ground and howling at the moon. Their claws and fangs even look real.

special_attacks.monster_message: The werewolf howls at the moon and a wolf howls back!

description: A person in a hazmat suit with a massive 'backpack' of a tank filled with a a strange glowing liquid. The tank is cracked, and a trail of horrid-looking gas follows them. They've obviously done everything possible to protect themselves from the outside world, plating their hazmat suit with steel. It wasn't enough. Through the face mask you can see that their skin is crawling, literally, and they're moaning as something shifts around inside their body. You almost see them smile, but there's no way, right?

special_attacks.description: The germaphobe sprays their chemical mixture everywhere!

special_attacks.monster_message: The germaphobe moans as a swarm of bugs crawls out of their suit!

name: Jock Shock - Superpsycho Version
description: The human body is a machine that turns the energy harvested by plants into electrical brain waves. With the correct technique and precise electromagnetic interference, you can release this energy in your body and as lightning itself.

name: Shocking Movement
description: The moves gained by jock shocking.

A nearly ten foot tall human in a full body suit of power armor, the only visible part of their body being a face covered entirely in bionic mods. They have cybernetic eyes, a suberdermal carbon filament all over their face, and a facial distortion cbm to boot. One of their arms is a state-of-the-art bionic shotgun, but you're sure they've got some tricks up their other sleeve. They're obviously juiced up on something, tension in every muscle as they scan for something or someone to kill.

special_attacks.description: The superpsycho raises their shotgun arm with a wicked gleam in their eye.

special_attacks.monster_message: You hear a high-pitched revving sound!

name: Tailor weaves psycho
description: summons psychos

name: Spawn circus psycho
description: Spawns a psycho

name: Spawn psycho samurai
description: Spawns a psycho

name: Spawn psycho priest
description: Spawns a psycho

name: Spawn psycho germaphobe
description: Spawns a psycho

name: Spawn psycho werewolf
description: Spawns a psycho

name: Spawn psycho knight
description: Spawns a psycho

name: Spawn psycho
description: Spawns a psycho

name: Spawn psycho cook
description: Spawns a psycho

name: Spawn psycho
description: Spawns a superpsycho

A human in flowing raiments of black and red. Looking closely, you see that their clothes are made of a web of threads that are constantly in motion like some sort of living creature. They're covered in jewelry, and threads dangle from their undeniably graceful fingers. They slap a switch of wandwood against their own back as if in some religious worship of the all-powerful Vergery.

special_attacks.description: The tailor's hands weave a tripping net of black sinew.

special_attacks.monster_message: The tailor weaves a psycho out of black sinew!
